description: The Static Analysis Engine subsystem is critical for understanding and processing source code within the project. It leverages Language Server Protocols for deep code analysis, stores the resulting insights, and efficiently tracks code changes to enable incremental analysis.

components.name: LSP Client/Integration
components.description: Manages communication with Language Server Protocols (LSP) to perform syntax highlighting, code completion, diagnostics, and other language-specific analyses. It acts as an interface to various language servers, extracting structured information from the source code.

components.name: Analysis Result Store
components.description: Responsible for persisting and retrieving the results generated by the static analysis process. This includes parsed Abstract Syntax Trees (ASTs), symbol tables, diagnostic messages, and other derived code insights, often using a robust database solution.

components.name: Code Diff Analyzer
components.description: Identifies and analyzes changes between different versions of code. It pinpoints modified, added, or deleted code segments, which is crucial for incremental analysis, understanding the impact of code evolution, and triggering targeted re-analysis.
